configFile Class Reference

A class to store the state of a configuration file in the config editor. Various methods on the class allow you to interact with the file and up/download it from the file server. More...

class pluginBase

Detailed Description

A class to store the state of a configuration file in the config editor. Various methods on the class allow you to interact with the file and up/download it from the file server.

Member Function Documentation

Checkout the file or directory from the server.

Parameters:
bBlock (bool) If true then wait for the operation to complete before returning.
Returns:
(bool) true if operation succeeded. false if it failed

List (recursively) all the files in a directory on the server.

Parameters:

Returns:
(bool) Did the call succeed?

Download the file or directory from the server.

Is this file modified later on disk than we modded it?

Record the current mod time of a file so we can tell if it has changed.

This is where responses to commands come in.

void configFile::requestLoad (   )  [protected]
 

Send a callback to the parent asking it to reload me from disk

void configFile::sendCommand (  QString  sCommand  )  [protected]
 

Ask the config editor to perform a command on this file.

Parameters:
sCommand (QString) The name of the command (eg. "download")

bool configFile::setClean (   ) 
 

Mark a file that was dirty as clean. This should be done after saving a file NOT as a direct result of a save() request. The file will be automatically uploaded to the server at a suitable point.

bool configFile::setDirty (   ) 
 

Mark a file as modified in RAM. You will later receive a callback into save() when it is time to save it to disk.

Returns:
(bool) true if succeeded. false if you have no lock on the file

void configFile::timerEvent (  QTimerEvent *  te  )  [protected, virtual]
 

Called when an operation times out. Time to abandon the operation and return all blocking processes with fail.

bool configFile::upload (  bool  bBlock = false  ) 
 

Upload file or directory to the server.

Parameters:

Returns:
(bool) true if operation succeeded. false if it failed

bool configFile::wait (  int  nType = -1  ) 
 

Wait for pending operations on a file to complete.

Parameters:
nType Specify an operation to wait for (eg DOWNLOAD, LOCK, UNLOCK, UPLOAD). Omit this param to wait for all operations.
Returns:
(bool) false if any operations failed else true
